profile¶

each gene is defined by a profile. a Profile must match a file in which is a HMM profile.

ProfileFactory API reference¶

class txsscanlib.gene.ProfileFactory¶

build and cached all Profile objects. Profiles must not be instanciate directly. the profile_factory must be used. The profile_factory ensure there is only one instance of profile for a given name. To get a profile use the method get_profile. If the profile is already cached this instance is returned otherwise a new profile is build, cached then returned.

get_profile(gene, cfg)¶
Returns:return profile corresponding to the name.

If the profile already exists return it otherwise build it and return :rtype: txsscanlib.gene.Profile object

Profile API reference¶

class txsscanlib.gene.Profile(gene, cfg)[source]¶

handle profile

__init__(gene, cfg)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • gene – the gene corresponding to this profile
  • cfg (txsscanlib.config.Config object) – the configuration
__len__()[source]¶
Returns:the length of the HMM profile
Return type:int
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

_len()[source]¶

Parse the HMM profile to get the length and cache it this private method is called at the Profile init

execute()[source]¶

execute the hmmsearch with this profile

Returns:an HMM report
Return type:txsscanlib.report.HMMReport object
